flawed_nl_solution:
They have $162 for helium because 200 - 42 - 18 - 14 = <<200-42-18-14=162>>162.
They can buy 108 ounces of helium because 162 / 1.5 = <<162/1.5=108>>108
They can fly 12204 feet up because 108 x 113 = <<108*113=12204>>12204
#### 12204

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 126, not 162. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
